name: LeapFish
tag_list: leapfish, leapfish-com, search-engines, meta-search-engine, seach-aggregator, ben-behrouzi
overview:
LeapFish is an evolved search engine that provides a single, connected, multimedia experience for both searching and sharing traditional, social and real-time content making the new web easier to navigate, more integrated and ultimately more efficient.

LeapFish Searches The New Web

-Personal Internet Dashboard: -Technically advanced customizable Personal Homepage Allowing the Addition of Multiple Feeds, Applications and Access Points.

-Variety of the Web: Delivery of Rich MultiMedia Content via integration of Major Authorities in Imagery, Videos, News, Blogs, Tweets, Encyclopedia & more on nearly any search query.

-Real â€“ Time Search : Delivery of relevant real-tme content via development of high impact real-time Search Platform capturing content from the Social Web.

-Searching and Sharing: Easy, convenient, seamless integration of sharing mechanisms delivering the merge of social and traditional web at nearly every piece of content.

Why itâ€™s Important

-Content providers benefit from inclusion as integration offers more stage time for their content.

-Consumers benefit with increased control over their lens to the web & with access to new found multimedia content from the new web.

-Anyone can now search & share the freshest, most relevant and most interesting content as its found to any network in the Social Web.

For more information visit blog.leapfish.com.

LeapFish Inc., is a privately held corporation headquartered out of CARR America Corporate Center in Pleasanton California, 45 minutes east of San Francisco.

milestones.description: Behnam Behrouzi, LeapFish CEO, Speaks to Real Time Search on SearchEngineWatch.com

While the mainstream media tend to focus on the big three search engines-Google, Yahoo!, and Microsoft's Bing-and many searchers tend to just use the same search engine (usually Google), there's actually a thriving world of alternative search engines out
